snippet.title: Ocean Planet - Steam Trailer
snippet.description:
Ocean Planet takes gameplay style inspired by 'Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy' to the extreme with a higher focus on atmospheric & immersive visuals, gameplay progression, hypnotic ambience, and a VERY lengthy main game map, where the difficulty stems from the map itself rather than frustrating controls.

🎮 Ocean Planet Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2985740/Ocean_Planet/
🎵 Ocean Planet - Ambient Soundtrack https://youtu.be/34BJLvU_kW0?si=z5rlufGz5AIWDL8J
🌐 Ocean Planet Discord: https://discord.gg/23qxUNVS

#trailer #indiegame #steamgame
